WorkItem.ClosedComment:
The answer "update to jQuery 1.6.1" was accepted as the correct answer on Stackoverflow.
The problem is jQuery/IE9 specific, and not a problem in RateIt.
WorkItem.Description:
I am having that problem that the RateIt stars are not showing in IE 9.
 
My Website is: www.vinderhimlen.dk
 
I have also created a stackoverflow question: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/6160673/jquery-rateit-plugin-bug-stars-not-showing-in-ie
 
Best regards,
Asker

Comments.Message: Here is how it should look like

I've answered in stackoverflow .

It seems to be a IE9 vs jQuery problem, which apparently should be fixed in jQuery 1.5.1 . 
Although you do reference jQuery 1.5.1 in your code (the google cdn version). Later on you also reference jQuery 1.5 (the one with the bug).

Hope that fixes it.
